name: Treat Squad
description:
Grevil the Galling, the Wicked Witch of Halloween, has stolen this Halloween's supplies of treats and goodies! It's up to the Treat Squad to get them back! !!!!!!CALLING THE TREAT SQUAD!!!!!! Features 

 - Online Multiplayer Co-op with as many friends as you can muster 

- Dedicated master server allowing for easy player-hosted game sessions

 - Sandbox base building

 - Action Arcade combat 

- RPG-style character progression and stats 

- Collect 9 different types of candy that all do different things

- 3 Bosses 

- 14 Enemies 

- Build an incredible pile of collected treats 

- Character customization


Controls Right Click: Delete tile Left Click: Shoot / Place tile W, A, S,D: Move F1: Toggle fullscreen Z: Equip Walls X: Equip Doors C: Equip Windows F: Equip Blaster Looking for people to play with? Join the Treat Squad discord server: https://discord.gg/7HMQAYVkfp
